channel.title: Purescape team
channel.description:
Well this is the concept
Well im making a new project project name purescape Concept: A server made for pures by a pure basicly only stats trainable whould be range str mage and att but if you become a def put you limit for att is 3 and for str is 10 for a str pure the def limit is 20 for a mage 1 def only 1 range 1 str 1 att for range 10 def only and for a tank def range and mage only you whould pick what you want to be when you log in so right there the limits would be set next you would have to pick a style eg : str pure style dragon
Areas:
Str pure area Range pure area Mage tank ect...
Items well might be Jagex items might be regular not sure yet
Well heres what i need staff so all coders welcome
for more updates go to [url=http://codeusa.proboards51.com/index.cgi]http://codeusa.proboards51.com/index.cgi[/url]
Staff Aj Awoodcutta more to be added[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2008, 03:49:21 PM[/size][hr]Oh yea Must have some knowledge in java
